wordGroup: to the accompaniment of 在…的伴奏下

sentences.en: They performed to the accompaniment of guitars.
sentences.cn: 他们在吉他的伴奏下表演。

sentences.en: He sang "My Funny Valentine" and "Wanted" to musical director Jim Steffan's piano accompaniment.
sentences.cn: 他在音乐总监吉姆·斯蒂芬的钢琴伴奏下演唱了《我可爱的情人》与《需要有人爱》。

sentences.en: The pianist improvised an accompaniment to the song.
sentences.cn: 那位钢琴家为那首歌即席伴奏。
